text: The German-speaking electoral college (, , ) is a European Parliament constituency in Belgium. It represents the German-speaking regions of Belgium. It was created in 1994. The German-speaking electoral college is the smallest constituency in the European Parliament by population. It is also the only single-member constituency in the European Parliament and the only one to be elected using first-past-the-post voting (FPTP). ==Election results== ==References== Category:European Parliament constituencies in Belgium
title: German-speaking electoral college
